title: Music cape

properties.value: The Music cape is a Cape of accomplishment. The music cape can be obtained by players who have unlocked all non-holiday music tracks. It is purchased—along with the music hood—from Olaf the Bard in Rellekka for 99,000. With the purchase of the cape and hood, the player will also unlock the Air Guitar emote, which acts as the cape's Skill Cape emote.

SMW Subobject for UntrimmedHigh Alchemy value: 59400Examine: The cape worn by music aficionados.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Music capeUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Music cape.pngWeight: 0.453Value: 99000Version anchor: UntrimmedRelease date: 30 July 2015Item ID: 13221

The Music cape is a Cape of accomplishment. The music cape can be obtained by players who have unlocked all non-holiday music tracks. It is purchased—along with the music hood—from Olaf the Bard in Rellekka for 99,000. With the purchase of the cape and hood, the player will also unlock the Air Guitar emote, which acts as the cape's Skill Cape emote.

The cape grants unlimited teleports to Falo the Bard. This is especially convenient for players doing master clue scrolls.

To trim the music cape, the player must unlock all music tracks, including holiday event tracks, and have completed all quests and Achievement Diaries. After meeting the requirements, the player can right-click the cape and select the Trim option. The trimmed cape can be reverted back to the untrimmed version by selecting the Untrim option.

Should a new, non-holiday song be released, the cape will be unequipped, and the player cannot equip or operate it until the new songs are unlocked. If the player's inventory is full, the cape will be placed in the player's bank instead. In the event that both the player's inventory and bank are full, the player will have to re-purchase the cape and hood from Olaf the Bard.

This item can be stored in the cape rack of a costume room, as part of the Music cape set, along with the hood. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

As of 26 February 2020, there are 11,543 current members that have obtained the music cape.[1]

Requirements[edit | edit source]

A player performing the Air Guitar emote.

A list of all music tracks and locations can be found here. It is recommended to use the modern music area mode if attempting to unlock music.

Skills needed[edit | edit source]

  • 75 Slayer to be eligible for a gargoyle task for a chance to obtain the brittle key, in order to gain access to the Grotesque Guardians (cannot be boosted)
  • 70 Hitpoints to enter the Zamorak camp in the God Wars Dungeon (cannot be boosted)
  • 70 Agility to enter the Saradomin camp in the God Wars Dungeon, as well as a rope to access the area (cannot be boosted)
  • 65 Thieving to enter all of the different seasonal gardens in the Sorceress's Garden minigame
  • 50 Mining (along with the Museum Camp built and having 150 Varrock Museum Kudos) to access the Volcanic Mine
  • 50 Firemaking to unlock Ice and Fire in the Wintertodt's prison
  • 35 Fishing to unlock Tempor of the Storm while fighting Tempoross
  • 33 Magic to unlock Mind over Matter in Telekinetic Theatre (can be boosted)

Items needed[edit | edit source]

  • A champion's scroll to unlock Victory is Mine inside the Champions' Challenge Arena
  • A dark totem to unlock Darkly Altared inside Skotizo's lair beneath the Catacombs of Kourend
  • A mossy key to unlock Roots and Flutes inside Bryophyta's lair
  • A Hespori seed to unlock A Thorn in My Side inside the Hespori cave
  • A fire cape to unlock the Mor Ul Rek track and in order to take on TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges, which unlocks the Inferno track
  • A Mimic to unlock Box of Delights inside The Mimic's fight area

Miscellaneous[edit | edit source]

  • Reach the Great Olm in the Chambers of Xeric to unlock Fire in the Deep
  • Reach Verzik Vitur's treasure vault in the Theatre of Blood to unlock The Curtain Closes; players may spectate a raid to unlock all of the music associated with the Theatre of Blood
  • A large majority of quests completed as they have unique music tracks and unlock more areas with unique music
  • The miniquest The Frozen Door must be completed to unlock The Ancient Prison, which, in turn, requires the player to kill all four God Wars Dungeon bosses.

The following tracks are not required to unlock the music cape, although they are required to trim it:

  • Bunny's Sugar Rush
  • Diango's Little Helpers
  • Dies Irae
  • Eve's Epinette
  • Easter Jig
  • A Festive Party
  • Funny Bunnies
  • Grimly Fiendish
  • High Spirits
  • Jungle Bells
  • Jungle Island Xmas
  • Land of Snow
  • Nox Irae
  • Scrubfoot's Descent
  • Sea Minor Shanty
  • Sea Shanty Xmas
  • Winter Funfair

Concept art[edit | edit source]

  • Pre-release work-in-progress model of the music cape

  • Various music cape designs presented to players for voting

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 October 2018
(update)

The front patch of colour on the untrimmed cape was changed from tan to white.

25 August 2016
(update)

The "Teleport" option was added, granting unlimited teleports to Falo the Bard.

6 August 2015
(update)

Ironmen can now unlock the Fishing Trawler music tracks in order to attain the Music Cape.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Unlike other capes of accomplishment, the music cape's emote is not performed with the Skill Cape emote, and thus does not require the cape to be worn to perform its emote.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Old School RuneScape. "OSRS Data Stream 2020 - Old School RuneScape's 7th Birthday!." (31m43s), YouTube video. 26 February 2020.

The '''Music cape''' is a [[Cape of accomplishment]]. The music cape can be obtained by players who have unlocked all non-holiday [[music]] tracks. It is purchased—along with the [[music hood]]—from [[Olaf the Bard]] in [[Rellekka]] for {{coins|99,000}}. With the purchase of the cape and hood, the [[Account|player]] will also unlock the [[Air Guitar]] [[emote]], which acts as the cape's [[Skill Cape (emote)|Skill Cape]] emote.

The cape grants unlimited teleports to [[Falo the Bard]]. This is especially convenient for players doing [[master clue scrolls]].

To trim the music cape, the player must unlock all music tracks, including holiday event tracks, and have completed all quests and [[Achievement Diaries]]. After meeting the requirements, the player can right-click the cape and select the ''Trim'' option. The trimmed cape can be reverted back to the untrimmed version by selecting the ''Untrim'' option.

Should a new, non-holiday song be released, the cape will be unequipped, and the player cannot equip or operate it until the new songs are unlocked. If the player's inventory is full, the cape will be placed in the player's bank instead. In the event that both the player's inventory and bank are full, the player will have to re-purchase the cape and hood from Olaf the Bard.

{{Costume storage|cape rack|Music cape set, along with the [[Music hood|hood]]|set=true}}

As of 26 February 2020, there are '''11,543''' current members that have obtained the music cape.{{CiteVideo|author=Old School RuneScape|title=OSRS Data Stream 2020 - Old School RuneScape's 7th Birthday!|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfB2bBacxJ8&t=31m43s|timestamp=31m43s|date=26 February 2020|site=YouTube|notes=|name=}}

==Requirements==
[[File:Air Guitar.gif|frame|right|A player performing the [[Air Guitar]] emote.]]
''A list of all music tracks and locations can be found [[Music|here]]. It is recommended to use the modern music area mode if attempting to unlock music.''
===Skills needed===

*{{SCP|Slayer|75}} [[Slayer]] to be eligible for a [[gargoyle]] task for a chance to obtain the [[brittle key]], in order to gain access to the [[Grotesque Guardians]] ('''cannot''' be [[Temporary skill boost|boosted]])<!-- A Hydra task is not needed to get "Alchemical Attack!" — you can enter the room for the track without the task -->
*{{SCP|Hitpoints|70}} [[Hitpoints]] to enter the Zamorak camp in the [[God Wars Dungeon]] ('''cannot''' be boosted)
*{{SCP|Agility|70}} [[Agility]] to enter the Saradomin camp in the God Wars Dungeon, as well as a [[rope]] to access the area ('''cannot''' be boosted)
*{{SCP|Thieving|65}} [[Thieving]] to enter all of the different seasonal gardens in the [[Sorceress's Garden]] minigame
*{{SCP|Mining|50}} [[Mining]] (along with the [[Museum Camp]] built and having 150 [[Varrock Museum]] Kudos) to access the [[Volcanic Mine]]
*{{SCP|Firemaking|50}} [[Firemaking]] to unlock [[Ice and Fire]] in the [[Wintertodt]]'s prison
*{{SCP|Fishing|35}} [[Fishing]] to unlock [[Tempor of the Storm]] while fighting [[Tempoross]]
*{{SCP|Magic|33}} [[Magic]] to unlock [[Mind over Matter]] in [[Telekinetic Theatre]] ('''can''' be boosted)

===Items needed===
*A [[champion's scroll]] to unlock [[Victory is Mine]] inside the [[Champions' Challenge]] Arena
*A [[dark totem]] to unlock [[Darkly Altared]] inside [[Skotizo]]'s lair beneath the [[Catacombs of Kourend]]
*A [[mossy key]] to unlock [[Roots and Flutes]] inside [[Bryophyta]]'s lair
*A [[Hespori seed]] to unlock [[A Thorn in My Side]] inside the [[Hespori]] cave
*A [[fire cape]] to unlock the [[Mor Ul Rek (music track)|Mor Ul Rek]] track and in order to take on [[TzHaar-Ket-Rak's Challenges]], which unlocks the [[Inferno (music track)|Inferno]] track
*A [[Mimic]] to unlock [[Box of Delights]] inside [[The Mimic]]'s fight area

===Miscellaneous===
*Reach the [[Great Olm]] in the [[Chambers of Xeric]] to unlock [[Fire in the Deep]]
*Reach [[Verzik Vitur]]'s treasure vault in the [[Theatre of Blood]] to unlock [[The Curtain Closes]]; players may spectate a raid to unlock all of the music associated with the Theatre of Blood
*A large majority of quests completed as they have unique music tracks and unlock more areas with unique music
*The miniquest [[The Frozen Door]] must be completed to unlock [[The Ancient Prison]], which, in turn, requires the player to kill all four [[God Wars Dungeon]] bosses.

The following tracks are '''not''' required to unlock the music cape, although they are required to trim it:
*[[Bunny's Sugar Rush]]
*[[Diango's Little Helpers]]
*[[Dies Irae]]
*[[Eve's Epinette]]
*[[Easter Jig]]
*[[A Festive Party]]
*[[Funny Bunnies]]
*[[Grimly Fiendish]]
*[[High Spirits]]
*[[Jungle Bells]]
*[[Jungle Island Xmas]]
*[[Land of Snow (music track)|Land of Snow]]
*[[Nox Irae]]
*[[Scrubfoot's Descent]]
*[[Sea Minor Shanty]]
*[[Sea Shanty Xmas]]
*[[Winter Funfair]]
